channel.title: Ffmpeg on Rosenkreutz Studio
channel.description: Recent content in Ffmpeg on Rosenkreutz Studio

item.title: FFmpeg Encoder Decoder for Python
item.description: Introduction As a python-c-api implementation, this project allows users to use pure python codes to read/write video files as easily as calling open function series. Currently it supports the formats including mpeg2, h254, h265(hevc), vp8, vp9, etc. By designing a dual-thread architecture, it could also demux the remote video stream including rtp, rstp, etc. Because it is used for analytical purposes, this project does not extract the audio stream in the video file/stream.
